scripts.pkg:prepare: npm run pkg:build && npm run pkg:pack && npm run pkg:move
scripts.clean-install: npm run clean && npm install cloudinary-url-gen.tgz && npm install
scripts.test:import: sed -i '' 's/"test-import-require",/"test-import-require", "type": "module",/' package.json && npm run pkg:prepare && npm run clean-install && node ./testImport.js
scripts.test: npm run test:import && npm run test:require && npm run clean && rm cloudinary-url-gen.tgz
